description:
Oota has devised a perfect plan to scare Kashiwada: invite her to his house while the two of them are alone.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Oota-kun no Ie / Kashiwada-san to Ohanami / Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun Change
Oota-kun`s House / Kashiwada-san and Cherry Blossoms / Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun`s Change
太田君の家 / 柏田さんとお花見 / 柏田さんと太田君チェンジ
